name: OPOLY+
description:
We all know Opoly games! But have you ever played one online with others in your town, city, state, country or in other countries? Well, Opoly+ is the first multi-player cross platform Opoly game that gives players a chance to play against other players in different game themes all over the world.

Choose between one and three opponents, choose your avatar, and start playing. You have over 75 different game themes to choose from as you play. Will you manage to win at each of the games? The last non-bankrupted player with the most money wins the game in any game theme.

Game themes in Opoly+ are as follows: Beagle io, Bulldog io, California io, Cat io, Chav io, Chihuahua io, China io, Cola io, Cold War io, Corgi-opoly, Country Music io, Curse io, Democratic Presidents io, Dino io, Doggy io, Dunkopoly, Election 2016 io, Election 2020 io, Fish io, Food io, Football-opoly, Golden io, Gulf War io, HBCU-opoly, Hillary vs Trump io, Hip-Hop io, Homework io, Hotelopoly, Iraq War io, Jazz io, Kansas io, Korean War io, Labrador io, Life io, Lowell-opoly, Mall-opoly, Missouri io, Music io, Nail Art-opoly, Newsopoly, Paparazzi io, Pet io, Picture io, Poodle io, Presidents io, Pug io, Puggle-opoly, R&B io, Reggae io, Rentopoly (Chicago), Rentopoly (Dallas), Rentopoly (Los Angeles), Rentopoly (Milwaukee), Rentopoly (NYC), Rentopoly (USA), Republican Presidents io, Revolutionary War io, Schnauzer-opoly, Socialopoly, Space, Texas io, Thug io, Toy Dogs-opoly, Vietnam War io, Wild LIfe io, World War I io, World War II io, Zombie io, and many more.

• Annual Multiplayer Subscription offers multiplayer for 365 days for $9.99.
